page.title: 12Shopping/Trade facilities.
page.content: Many people from outside areas come to our town on Friday and Saturday to the open air market ond town centre the main things sold there are clothes, food and jewellery. Also in our main shopping area there are a variety of shops such as dry cleaners, clothes, food, cards, sports, butchers, jewellers, green grocers, florists, hair dressers, chemists and bakers. Most shops close for half-day on Thursday. We have a large Superstore called Leo's which has only been open a few years. This is outside the town centre. The main shopping area and the Superstore have a very good car parking facilities. There are not many local businesses but some examples are Estate agents, solicitors, builders merchants, car sales and accountants.
